item.title: Crime Concentration Explorer
item.author: Andrew Smith
item.description:
Crime Concentration Explorer

Rationale

This app has been built as a proof-of-concept tool for practitioners and policymakers with an interest in the patternsof crime concentration, using only publically available data. It enables users to visualise crime hotspots over timefor a given Police Force Area (PFA).

item.title: Comparison of Crime Concentration Measures
item.author: Andrew Smith
item.description:
Comparison of Crime Concentration Measures

The purposes of these analyses are twofold:

  • apply established methodologies for measuring crime concentration to our data and present the results
  • critique the methodologies from both a practical and theoretical perspective

Links are provided to the relevant notebooks in each section.
